name: Miscellaneous
content:
Miscellaneous

Name Rank Tags Timing Target Range Check Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.gYsQKtDhKqUqoes1]{Magnifying Glass} 1 - - - None 5

A small object used for observation and setting black paper on fire.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.8SmWdwyLjHzatIP3]{Adventurer's Kit} 1 - - - None 5

Contains: chalk, flint, writing implement, spade, hammer & chisel, ten meters of rope.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.cTqFimjdNXNNVToi]{Telescope} 1 - - - None 10

For viewing objects from a distance. Misusing it is prohibited!
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.VCnWg4RQ2AvuTS8Y]{Sleeping Bag} 1 Rest Time Self Close None 20

Camping essential. It promises a good night's sleep.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.5iBbOpCJcg2AzOGy]{Cursed Stone} 1 Rare - - - None 5

While this item is in your inventory, you take a -1 penalty to [Hit Checks].
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.CTCRsGQpWmwCjnNw]{Cursed Iron} 1 Rare - - - None 5

While this item is in your inventory, you take a -1 penalty to [Dodge Checks].
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.eMJ99Dcxqhv8TiMr]{Tent (Camping)} 1 Rest Time Six Close None 150

Camping essential. That said, adventurers endure the night winds as well.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.UaE8vQ2LhmHDWcRe]{Perfume} 1 - - - None 20

Not for everyday use. If your comrades are sharp-nosed, it can be used as a landmark or signal.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.sdP6ILN1KNdh7gu5]{Tent (Pavilion)} 1 Rest Time Area (P) Close None 800

Useful for raids, guild training camps, and small festivals.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.GnPGoTEqx0zC4fim]{Crystal Ball of Memories} 1 Rare, Magic Item Major Area (P) 4 Sq None 40

Photographic equipment to record surrounding scenes. [Activate: Major] Record 1 Sq scenery as a still image from up to 4 Sq of yourself. [Activate: Major] Project recorded images on nearby walls and on the ground.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.sH8JkO5FjOXgZyIT]{Clockwork Bird} 4 Rare, Magic Item Initiative Self - None 70

Clockwork that assists the surrounding observation by the user. [Activate: Initiative] +1 for actions used at the same time as actions with the [Scout] tag. If you fumble the action relating to [Scout] tag you may reroll that fumble.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.miscellaneous.384X4Rq3Rg7SLIIQ]{Magical Latern} 8 Rare, Magic Item Setup Single Close None 160

A lighting fixture that burns a Magic Catalyst. [Activate: Set Up] Remove the prop [Dim Light], [Darkness], and [Curtain of Darkness] which is within the range of [Wide 20]. This effect lasts until the end of the scene.
